lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Southern said new rules of the Financial Accounting Standards Board, which are effective in January 1988, require any costs that are determined nonrecoverable to be charged against earnings once that determination is made.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The utility said fuel loading has been completed at Unit One and the unit is being put through a series of low-power tests before the Nuclear Regulatory Commission is asked for a full-power license.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In addition, the company said, Georgia Power's contracts with the joint owners require the utility to buy back significant amounts of Vogtle capacity during the plant's initial years of operation.
